response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and significance, which aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations, just like it has done for others before you. I understand its worth to you is equivalent to $800,000, and I am excited to extend this offer to you at a carefully considered price of $750,000. This represents a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate, ensuring you receive exceptional quality without compromising on your budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you require any further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
